item.description: 1. create container docker run -d --restart=on-failure \ --name unitree_ws \ --cap-add=SYS_PTRACE \ --gpus='"device=1"' \ -e USER=unitree \ -e PASSWORD=123 \ --shm-size=1024m \ -p 10025:22 \ -p 14025:4000 \ registry.cn-hongkong.aliyuncs.com/gezp/ubuntu-desktop:20.04-cu11.0.3 the default username and password are both ubuntu. 2. access conatiner by ssh ( recommended to use vscode + remote ssh plugin) ssh ubuntu@host-ip -p 10025 3. 安装 ros1 noetic 和 ros2 foxy wget http://fishros.com/install -O fishros && . fishros 4. 安装 unitree_guide 安装 lcm git clone https://github.com/lcm-proj/lcm.git git checkout v1.4.0 apt install -y openjdk-8-jdk mkdir build cd build cmake .. make export LCM_INSTALL_DIR=/usr/local/lib sudo make install sudo ldconfig Ubuntu20.04安装、编译LCM1.4.0教程_ubuntu20.04

开始 删除原有软件源并更新软件源 在 .bashrc 文件中编辑 export PYTHONPATH=~/ws/src/O-CNN/octree/build/python:${PYTHONPATH} 进入 ws 目录 source ~/.bashrc && cd ws && . install/setup.bash 执行命令 ros2 run drl_grasping ex_random_agent.bash 你可能会收到如下错误： export IGN_GAZEBO_SYSTEM_PLUGIN_PATH=/root/ws/install/lib
